Articles.Content:
Like the title said, when i load a subassemblies it wont show the strut connected, it's normal? Any fix?

Edited April 3, 2014 by Daze

Sometimes it happens to me. Sturts are not missing, they are not connected sometimes, for some unknown reason.

However, when you load the vessel on the launchpad it should work fine.

When you go to make a subassembly, remove the part you want to make a subassembly of instead of duplicating it with alt click. This will prevent struts and fuel lines that do not leave the subassembly from breaking, but struts and fuel lines that connect to something outside the subassembly will still break.

http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/2315

However, when you load the vessel on the launchpad it should work fine.

nope. They're still broken on launch pad, if OP is talking about either of the bugs I'm thinking about.

Thank you
